mapper.select: select blog.id, blog.title, blog.content, blog.created_time, blog.user_id , commenter.name as comment_commenter_name, commenter.email as comment_commenter_email , commenter.password as comment_commenter_password, comment.content as comment_content, comment.id as comment_id, comment.created_time as comment_created_time, comment.blog_id as comment_blog_id, comment.user_id as comment_comenter_id from blog left join comment on comment.blog_id = blog.id left join user as commenter on comment.user_id = commenter.id where blog.id = #{id}
